description: An easy recipe for an authentic and classic Italian meal. This recipe requires only 13 ingredients.
A morning twist on one of your favorite foods that can be completely customized with whatever is in your pantry.
A classic and delicious sandwich that you can put together in a whim.
This super creamy and delicious pasta is a one pot recipe that will become your new favorite way to eat pasta.

A advanced dish by Gordan Ramsay. 'A prime beef fillet, mushrooms, and ready-made pastry', the beef wellington by Gordan Ramsay is something meant for special occasions. If you want to wow friends and family at a dinner this is the dish for you.
Hungry but you're poor and/or don't wanna cook? Everyone knows what a classic cup of noodles are!
Rachel Ray's guacamole recipe! (Chips not included)
